page.title: 04The Civic Centre in Uxbridge
page.content: The Civic Centre is situated on the High st.In all, it covers an area of 8 acres.Building work began in 1973 and it was first opened in 1976.It houses the Councils administrative departments-Education,Housing,Social Services,Planning,Engineering,Leisure, Law and Administration,Finance, Building Design and Construction, Estates and Valuation and Corporate Staff.There are 3 main office floors which are open plan and each floor is divided into four split-level quadrants.There are also 4 committee rooms and accommodation for the Council.The buildings unique design, with its sloping roofs attracts a great deal of attention.The final cost of the building was 18.5 million,well over the original estimate.
